references.paper_title: Improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits
references.reason: This paper presents improved algorithms for linear stochastic bandits, which are fundamental to the neural bandit algorithms extended in the current paper.

references.paper_title: On exact computation with an infinitely wide neural net
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical understanding of neural networks, which is essential for analyzing the neural bandit algorithms extended in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Neural tangent kernel: Convergence and generalization in neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the neural tangent kernel, a key concept used for analyzing neural networks in the overparameterized regime, which is essential for analyzing the neural bandit algorithms discussed in this paper.

references.paper_title: A neural tangent kernel perspective of infinite tree ensembles
references.reason: This paper generalizes the neural tangent kernel theory to soft tree ensemble models which is the core theoretical contribution of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Neural contextual bandits with UCB-based exploration
references.reason: This paper proposes a neural contextual bandit algorithm with UCB-based exploration which is closely related to the algorithm proposed in the current paper.
